about_the_game:
This DLC is an expansion of the game's rhythm mini-game


Players unsatisfied with only hitting notes in brief sections, this DLC is for you.



-------------------

An all-new rhythm game expansion!


A goddess who loves music has sent Mystia a letter. She plans on expanding melodic activities throughout Gensokyo. If you also a music lover, reply to this letter and receive a test model of her rhythm arcade machine...!

We've turned the Sparrow Tune mini-game into its own expanded gamemode. In this gamemode, players can strum the beats of all the songs they hear during business at the izakaya, and complete them from beginning to end.



The songs are grouped according to location, such as Youkai Trail, Human Village, Hakurei Shrine, etc... completing all three tracks of a location unlocks the next.

Which means this DLC currently has a total of... 68 songs![\b]

Additionally, each time a location is completed, a musical medal will be awarded and decorate Mystia's notebook. This fine and lovely badge symbolizes your effort and musical achievements.



Collect all medals and gain the goddess's approval!

We hope players who enjoy music are able to have some fun with this DLC!!
detailed_description:
This DLC is an expansion of the game's rhythm mini-game


Players unsatisfied with only hitting notes in brief sections, this DLC is for you.



-------------------

An all-new rhythm game expansion!


A goddess who loves music has sent Mystia a letter. She plans on expanding melodic activities throughout Gensokyo. If you also a music lover, reply to this letter and receive a test model of her rhythm arcade machine...!

We've turned the Sparrow Tune mini-game into its own expanded gamemode. In this gamemode, players can strum the beats of all the songs they hear during business at the izakaya, and complete them from beginning to end.



The songs are grouped according to location, such as Youkai Trail, Human Village, Hakurei Shrine, etc... completing all three tracks of a location unlocks the next.

Which means this DLC currently has a total of... 68 songs![\b]

Additionally, each time a location is completed, a musical medal will be awarded and decorate Mystia's notebook. This fine and lovely badge symbolizes your effort and musical achievements.



Collect all medals and gain the goddess's approval!

We hope players who enjoy music are able to have some fun with this DLC!!

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS
  • Processor: 2 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Graphic Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal Sound Card
  • Additional Notes:

  • Processor: 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal Sound Card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5500 / Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750Ti / AMD HD 7790
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7&Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

short_description: This DLC is an expansion of the Sparrow Tune mini-game. It lets players fully play through each of the game's songs, each with different difficulties. This is a small love letter for players who, like us, love music and rhythm games.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
